Package me.mnafees

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CanvasChangeListener
    Listener to notify about changes regarding the canvas.
    ColorChangeListener
    Listener to notify about changes regarding a color change.
    CoordinatesChangeListener
    Listener to notify about changes regarding canvas coordinates.
    LineChangeListener
    Listener to notify about changes regarding a shape's stroke / line.
    ToolChangeListener
    Listener to notify about changes regarding a canvas tool.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BottomPanel
    BottomPanel is a container of 3 widgets including the current selected color indicator, the color palette and the coordinates indicator.
    Canvas
    Canvas is responsible for all operations on the JSketch drawing canvas.
    CanvasShape
    Container base-class for canvas shapes.
    CircleCanvasShape
    A circle-like shape to paint on the canvas.
    ColorPalette
    Container class to hold the color swatch.
    ColorPaletteButton
    A customised button to hold the colors of the color palette.
    Constants
    Utility class to hold static global constants.
    CoordinatesInfoPanel
    Container class to hold the current x and y coordinates of the mouse pointer on the canvas.
    Helpers
    Contains methods to be used as helpers and utility methods.
    JSketchFileFilter
    A file filter class for jsketch files.
    LineCanvasShape
    A line shape to paint on the canvas.
    LineThicknessPalette
    Container class for the line thickness selector.
    Main
    The main class to launch the main window.
    MainWindow
    The main window (JFrame) class responsible to instantiate all the components of JSketch.
    RectangleCanvasShape
    A Rectangular shape to paint on the canvas.
    ToolPalette
    Container class for all the tools available for the user to use.
    ToolPaletteButton
    Customised button to hold the different tool options.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Tool
    Enum to hold the different tool types.
